title: Huskies renew series with B.C.
text:
Wednesday, October 14, 2015 1:05 AM EDT 
Huskies renew series with B.C. BY ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN STORRS â€” Gene DeFilippo has been gone from Boston College for two years. Jim Calhoun left his coaching job at UConn three years ago. The rift between those two, mainly do to with conference realignment, is what has kept the Eagles and Huskies from competing in the major sports.That appears to be at an end.
